column4: what happened to my kaffeine player ? It doesn't play anything... same with totem
what does it do, just freeze up?
i had a similar problem with rhythmbox...it wouldnÂ´t play any songs or anything
for rhythmbox, i had to enable this verbose thinger lol it was confusing as all hell
i do not know if kaffeine uses gstreamer...does it?
ok, what program are you having a problem with? kaffeine?
ok...type in terminal: kaffeine --gst-plugin-spew then restart your system, it should work...it worked for me
but you used it with another programm right ? kaffeine doesnt know that option
check totem --help-all and see if there is gstreamer options
seems to be a sound daemon problem
oh...well i dont know anything about that :/
with which program did you use your option ?     and what do you mean with "via places" ? the button next to the k menu ?
i used it with rhythmbox...and via places i mean places in between system and apps
